mapper.sql: SELECT book_code, book_no, author, translator, title, price, rental_possible, image, cate_s_no, cate_m_no, cate_b_no, pub_no FROM proj_library.book
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proj_library.book (book_code, book_no, author, translator, title, price, rental_possible, image, cate_s_no, cate_m_no, cate_b_no, pub_no) VALUES(#{bookCode}, #{bookNo}, #{author}, #{translator}, #{title}, #{price}, #{rentalPossible}, #{image}, #{cateSNo.sCode}, #{cateMNo.mCode}, #{cateBNo.bCode}, #{pubNo.pubNo});
mapper.select: select b.*, cb.cate_b_name, cm.cate_m_name, cs.cate_s_name, p.pub_name,p.pub_no from book as b join category_b as cb on b.cate_b_no = cb.cate_b_no join category_m as cm on b.cate_m_no = cm.cate_m_no join category_s as cs on b.cate_m_no = cs.cate_m_no join publisher as p on b.pub_no = p.pub_no WHERE b.book_code=#{bookCode} and cb.cate_b_no =b.cate_b_no and cm.cate_m_no = b.cate_m_no and cm.cate_b_no = cb.cate_b_no and cs.cate_s_no = b.cate_s_no and cs.cate_m_no = cm.cate_m_no and cs.cate_b_no = cb.cate_b_no and p.pub_no = b.pub_no;
